mapper.insert: INSERT INTO VIDEO_POST (VIDEO_UUID, VIDEO_TITLE, VIDEO_DESCRIPTION, VIDEO_THUMBNAIL_URL, VIDEO_ORIGINAL_URL, VIDEO_ENCODED_URL, VIDEO_UPLOADED, VIDEO_CATEGORY) VALUES (#{videoUuid}, #{videoTitle}, #{videoDescription}, #{videoThumbnailUrl}, #{videoOriginalUrl}, #{videoEncodedUrl, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, #{videoCategory})
mapper.select: SELECT VIDEO_UUID, VIDEO_TITLE, VIDEO_DESCRIPTION, VIDEO_THUMBNAIL_URL, VIDEO_ORIGINAL_URL, VIDEO_ENCODED_URL, VIDEO_UPLOADED, VIDEO_CATEGORY FROM VIDEO_POST WHERE VIDEO_UUID = #{videoUuid}

SELECT VIDEO_UUID, VIDEO_TITLE, VIDEO_DESCRIPTION, VIDEO_THUMBNAIL_URL, VIDEO_ORIGINAL_URL, VIDEO_ENCODED_URL, VIDEO_UPLOADED, VIDEO_CATEGORY FROM VIDEO_POST WHERE
VIDEO_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
VIDEO_DESCRIPTION LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
1=1
ORDER BY VIDEO_UPLOADED DESC

SELECT VIDEO_UUID, VIDEO_TITLE, VIDEO_DESCRIPTION, VIDEO_THUMBNAIL_URL, VIDEO_ORIGINAL_URL, VIDEO_ENCODED_URL, VIDEO_UPLOADED, VIDEO_CATEGORY FROM VIDEO_POST ORDER BY VIDEO_UPLOADED DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{pageSize} ROWS ONLY
